name: typepy-vscode
description: Syntax highlighting and editor support for the TypePy language.

typepy.analyzer.command.description: Override the executable used for TypePy analysis. Leave empty to auto-detect.

typepy.analyzer.args.description: Extra arguments passed to the analyzer command before the file path.

typepy.analyzer.runOnSave.description: Run the TypePy analyzer automatically whenever a .tpy file is saved.

typepy.analyzer.runOnChange.description: Run the TypePy analyzer while typing (debounced). May increase CPU usage.

typepy.analyzer.changeDebounceMs.description: Delay in milliseconds before running the analyzer after edits when runOnChange is enabled.
